puakma.system
Class SessionContext

java.lang.Object
  puakma.system.SessionContext
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable, ErrorDetect
public class SessionContext
extends java.lang.Object
implements ErrorDetect, java.lang.Cloneable

The SessionContext is used to protect an individual user session from malicious damage (as does the SystemContext).
